name: Smoochum
flavorText:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

previous.name: Hitmontop
previous.flavorText:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.

next.name: Elekid
next.flavorText:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

pokemon.name: Smoochum
pokemon.flavorText:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.flavorText:
It seductively
wiggles its hips
as it walks. It can cause people
to dance in
unison with it.
